welcome.title: Harbor
welcome.subtext: Your free extended trial (8 nights) to Harbor's Remote Night Nanny is based on Harbor's availability, your family's eligibility, and is on a first come first serve basis. Free extended trial must be redeemed prior to October 1, 2024.
welcome.html: Harbor's Remote Night Nanny is 4 consecutive nights from 10pm to 6am.
welcome.subtitle: Online Scheduling
welcome.support: We are here to support you and your family.
welcome.availability: Please, enter your mobile phone number. We'll verify if we have your information already. If we do, we'll pre-fill your past information for a faster booking.

newUser.title: Need a refresher on Harbor's Remote Night Nanny?
newUser.subtext: We're pleased to offer you an extended free trial to Harbor's Remote Night Nanny!
newUser.html: You will only need to enter your information one more time - the next time you login, it will be here for you!

patientInfo.title: About the child
patientInfo.description: We use this information to ensure we're able to provide you with the best Remote Night Nanny experience. All information is secure and kept confidential.

errors.title: Age not in range
errors.description: These services are only available for children between the ages of 0 and 26.

dateOfBirth.format: Date must be in the format MM/DD/YYYY

waitingRoom.title: Congratulations!
waitingRoom.subtext: You're one step closer to resting easy. Our care team will reach out to book a 30 minute consultation prior to your trial.
